title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: IM21006 Operations Research-II Probability Theory Review: Probability space, Discrete and Continuous random variables and their moments, independence, joint distribution, conditional probability and conditional expectation; convergence of sequences of random variables; almost surely, in probability and in distribution. Strong Law of Large NumbersIntroduction to stochastic process; sample paths and finite dimensional distributions, Kolmogorovs consistency conditions.Renewal processes, reward and cost models, cumulative processes, Poisson process and stopping times.
